article: spiced rum is the secret to this delicious drink because it adds depth and flavor with just one ingredient . if you really want a stand-out cocktail , it 's easy to make your own spiced rum . simply combine a bottle of rum with whole spices such as cloves , cinnamon sticks , allspice berries , black peppercorns , and star anise . store it in a large jar with a tight-fitting lid and let steep for a few days , shaking daily . when the flavor is to your liking , strain and bottle it , then put it to use in cocktails such as this one .

ingredients 1 cup apple cider , divided 1 cup spiced rum , divided 4 teaspoons fresh lemon juice , divided 1 cup apple kombucha 4 cinnamon sticks apple slices directions combine 1/2 cup apple cider , 1/2 cup spiced rum , and 2 teaspoons lemon juice in a cocktail shaker over ice ; shake until chilled , about 30 seconds . pour over large ice cubes into two rocks glasses . repeat with remaining apple cider , rum , and lemon juice . add 1/4 cup apple kombucha to each glass . garnish each with 1 cinnamon stick , and apple slices , if desired .
